name: Hardest Oldies: Novelty Songs Trivia Quiz | Other Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: "Beep Beep" involves a race (of sorts) between what two cars?
questions.explanation:
Cadillac, Nash Rambler.

	"While driving in my Cadiilac, what to my surprise, a little Nash rambler was following me ..." Sung by The Playmates.

questions.text: What color was the "itsy bitsy teeny weeny bikini"?
questions.explanation:
yellow.

	"She wore an itsy bitsy teenie weenie yellow polka dot bikini" Sung by Brian Hyland.

questions.text: "Monster Mash" is sung in a manner that emulates what famous actor?

questions.explanation:
Sheb Wooley.

	Seville did "Witch Doctor". Pickett did "Monster Mash". Evans did "Seven Little Girls".

questions.text: Finish the lyric: "seven little girls, sittin' in the back seat, kissin' and a-huggin' with ..."
questions.explanation:
Fred.

	Cute stuff from days of innocence.

questions.text: There was a song (in questionable taste) called "They're Coming To Take Me Away". The singer's unlikely name was ...?
questions.explanation:
Napoleon.

	Actually, it was Napoleon XIV. Pulled off the radio by some stations for being offensive.

questions.text: What singer had a surprise hit with her song (from a movie) "Abba Dabba Honeymoon"?
questions.explanation:
Debbie Reynolds.

	Debbie sang it as part of a duet in one of her early movies.

questions.text: Allen Sherman's best known song begins with "hello mudda, hello fadda". What happens to the singer's friend Leonard in the song?
questions.explanation:
Ptomaine poisoning.

	"Hello, muddda ... hello, fadda". ("Here we are at Camp Granada.")Leonard got ptomaine poisoning after dinner. Joe got poison ivy.

questions.text: "Winchester Cathedral" has a decidedly different sound. Who sang it?
questions.explanation:
New Vaudeville Band.

	Hyland did "Itsy Bitsy Bikini". Playmates did "Beep Beep". Avalon did "Gingerbread".

questions.text: Last-but-not-least: Fill in the title: "My Wife Left Town With a ..."?
questions.explanation:
Banana.

	You may not know this one - the song had a short life. Weird lyrics.
